attributes.review: I... I CANNOT. When I heard about this app from trump I could help but download 😍 I’ve been using this app for a while but it’s taking up space on My phone 😡😡 When j use it my phone gets HOT. UGH I had to get another phone because i felt like it was anti trump company so I switched to iPhone 😢 STILL GETS HOT. one day my phone EXPLODED. DONT GET THIS APP ITS DANGEROUS.
attributes.title: SURPRISINGLY DISAPPOINTED 😡

attributes.review: So I wanted to download to support our fat, ugly so called president because it’s what Americans do❤️💖✨ This app gave me diarrhea for a week by seeing a man in front of something he destroyed. I had to go to the er of how bad it was. I wouldn’t recommend if you want your stomach to feel nauseous for multiple days
attributes.title: Nothing useless

attributes.review: If i could give this no stars i would! it took several days to download with my high speed wifi! when i opened the app i was immediately bombarded with homophobic slurs that wouldn’t stop! this app killed all of my house plants and i’m afraid my cats next. 0/10 donald trump is a old racist r*pist!
attributes.title: I hate donald trump!

attributes.review: I was trying out the app but as soon as I opened it, it told me to get out of this country 🤬🤬👎 and so I did try and then ice tried to kill me and eat me out alive, luckily I make it out in time with my good friend Naruto and but now I’m scared for my life 10/10 would not recommend this to anybody 👎👎👎👎👎👎🤮🤢😡🤬😤😤
attributes.title: I almost died 😭😡🤬

attributes.review: Wow this app seemed like it would have been amazing, I heard from tik tok that it was. Lagged my phone so bad I lost connection smh my head 👄 yeah so I’m leaving this review for that reason only not cause the algorithm told me too. With all the other low ratings it would be a shame if it gets to one star...
attributes.title: App lagged my phone!!!

attributes.review: It took the app almost a month to install and even worst nothing would load in the app! It kept playing my musics and opening other apps. The app even shut down my phone! This is absurd of how terrible this app is! DO NOT install this app at all cost!
attributes.title: Worst app on history!

attributes.review: This app took a week to download and overloaded my phone. This made it so slow to the point where I almost threw it away. Then when it finally downloaded, I opened it and it kept glitching out. I had to delete it, but it corrupted my phone and now i have issues with it.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
App is terrible it takes hours to download there’s nothing interesting about the app the people who work the app worst threatening my life because I did not leave a good review
This is by far the worst app ever seen on the App Store in the seven years that I’ve owned Apple devices this is unacceptable
attributes.title: what a terrible app

attributes.review: This app is so bad the worst app I have ever had/seen. It made my phone glitch so bad to the point where I had to get a new phone I just wanted to check out this app then realized I’m not racist, sexist nor a homophobe. This app supports and teaches people to be ignorant and stupid. I do not recommend this app!
attributes.title: Do not get this app

attributes.review: This app took forever to download. I could have given birth 48 times by the time it downloaded. Every time I would try to open the application it would just close right out of it. This app was not worth my time and it’s definitely not worth yours. Do not download this app!!!!!
attributes.title: A SCAM!!!!!!!
